languages.text: Whenever Shock Batons, Power Mauls or Hammers are equipped Arbitator additionally gains +10 to parry and -10 WS to the enemy on hit by those weapons until end of combat. They gain also an additional attack {g|f:b113924f2ec847e5ae0ccbc76809b704}Knock down{/g}

traits.locale_text: Whenever Shock Batons, Power Mauls or Hammers are equipped Arbitator additionally gains +10 to parry and -10 WS to the enemy on hit by those weapons until end of combat. They gain also an additional attack {g|f:b113924f2ec847e5ae0ccbc76809b704}Knock down{/g}

languages.text: With a one-handed shock baton or a one-handed power maul equipped, the Arbitrator gains +10% to {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} and reduces the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} of enemies {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with this weapon by −10 until the end of combat (does not stack). This weapon also deals +25% more {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g}.
languages.original_text: Когда арбитр экипирован одноручной шоковой дубиной или одноручной силовой булавой, он получает +10% к {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парированию{/g} и уменьшает {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближний Бой{/g} противников, получивших {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g} этим оружием, на −10 до конца боя (не суммируется). Также это оружие наносит на 25% больше {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критического урона{/g}.

traits.locale_text: With a one-handed shock baton or a one-handed power maul equipped, the Arbitrator gains +10% to {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} and reduces the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} of enemies {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with this weapon by −10 until the end of combat (does not stack). This weapon also deals +25% more {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g}.

With a one-handed shock baton, a one-handed power maul, or a one-handed power hammer equipped, the Arbitrator gains +10% to {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} and reduces the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} of enemies {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with this weapon by −10 until the end of combat (does not stack). This weapon also deals +25% more critical damage.

With a one-handed shock baton, a one-handed power maul, or a one-handed power hammer equipped, the Arbitrator gains +10% to {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} and reduces the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} of enemies {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with this weapon by −10 until the end of combat (does not stack). This weapon also deals +25% more critical damage.

With a one-handed shock baton, a one-handed power maul, or a one-handed power hammer equipped, the Arbitrator gains +10% to {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} and reduces the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} of enemies {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by this weapon by −10 until the end of combat (does not stack). Also, this weapon deals 25% additional critical damage.

With a one-handed shock baton or a one-handed power maul equipped, the Arbitrator gains +10% to {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} and reduces the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} of enemies {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with this weapon by −10 until the end of combat (does not stack). This weapon also deals +25% more {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g}.

languages.text: Yargıcı; tek el şok copu veya tek el güç tokmağı kuşandığında {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}savuşturma{/g} değerine +%10 kazanır. Bu silahlarla {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vurduğu{/g} düşmanların {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Silah Yeteneği{/g} nitelikleri 10 puan azalır. Bu etki, çatışma sonuna dek sürer ve üst üste birikmez. Ayrıca bu silahlar +%25 daha fazla {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritik hasar{/g} verir.
languages.original_text: With a one-handed shock baton or a one-handed power maul equipped, the Arbitrator gains +10% to {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} and reduces the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} of enemies {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with this weapon by −10 until the end of combat (does not stack). This weapon also deals +25% more {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Yargıcı; tek el şok copu veya tek el güç tokmağı kuşandığında {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}savuşturma{/g} değerine +%10 kazanır. Bu silahlarla {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vurduğu{/g} düşmanların {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Silah Yeteneği{/g} nitelikleri 10 puan azalır. Bu etki, çatışma sonuna dek sürer ve üst üste birikmez. Ayrıca bu silahlar +%25 daha fazla {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritik hasar{/g} verir.

languages.text: Mientras tenga equipada una porra eléctrica de una mano o una maza de energía de una mano, el Arbitrator gana un +10 % de {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parada{/g} y reduce la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g} de los enemigos {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}golpeados{/g} con el arma en un −10 hasta el final del combate (este efecto no es acumulativo). Además, esta arma inflige un +25 % más de {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}daño crítico{/g}.
languages.original_text: With a one-handed shock baton or a one-handed power maul equipped, the Arbitrator gains +10% to {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} and reduces the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} of enemies {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with this weapon by −10 until the end of combat (does not stack). This weapon also deals +25% more {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Mientras tenga equipada una porra eléctrica de una mano, una maza de energía de una mano o un martillo de energía de una mano, el Arbitrator gana un +10 % de {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parada{/g} y reduce la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g} de los enemigos {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}golpeados{/g} con el arma en un −10 hasta el final del combate (este efecto no es acumulativo). Además, esta arma inflige un +25 % más de daño crítico.

languages.text: 当法务官装备单手电棍、单手能量锤，获得+10%{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}，且使用此武器{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}敌人时，会使目标的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}降低10点，效果持续至战斗结束（此效果无法叠加）。除此之外，此武器的{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击伤害{/g}提高25%。
languages.original_text: With a one-handed shock baton or a one-handed power maul equipped, the Arbitrator gains +10% to {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} and reduces the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} of enemies {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with this weapon by −10 until the end of combat (does not stack). This weapon also deals +25% more {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 当法务官装备单手电棍、单手能量锤或单手动力锤时，获得+10%{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}，且使用此武器{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}敌人时，会使目标的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}降低10点，效果持续至战斗结束（此效果无法叠加）。除此之外，此武器的暴击伤害提高25%。

languages.text: Avec un bâton électrocuteur à une main, ou une masse énergétique à une main, l'arbitrator gagne un bonus de +10 % à la {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parade{/g} et réduit la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Capacité de combat{/g} des ennemis {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touchés{/g} par cette arme de −10 jusqu'à la fin du combat (non cumulable). De plus, cette arme inflige +25 % de dégâts {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critiques{/g}.
languages.original_text: With a one-handed shock baton or a one-handed power maul equipped, the Arbitrator gains +10% to {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} and reduces the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} of enemies {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with this weapon by −10 until the end of combat (does not stack). This weapon also deals +25% more {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Avec un bâton électrocuteur à une main, une masse énergétique à une main ou un marteau énergétique à une main, l'arbitrator gagne un bonus de +10 % à la {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parade{/g} et réduit la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Capacité de combat{/g} des ennemis {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touchés{/g} par cette arme de −10 jusqu'à la fin du combat (non cumulable). De plus, cette arme inflige +25 % de dégâts critiques.

languages.text: 片手のショックバトン、片手のパワーモールを装備していると、アービトレイターは+10%の{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}を付与され、この武器で{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}攻撃された{/g}敵の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器スキル{/g}を戦闘終了まで-10する（この効果はスタックしない）。また、この武器は{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルダメージ{/g}が+25%増加する。
languages.original_text: With a one-handed shock baton or a one-handed power maul equipped, the Arbitrator gains +10% to {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} and reduces the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} of enemies {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with this weapon by −10 until the end of combat (does not stack). This weapon also deals +25% more {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 片手のショックバトン、片手のパワーモール、片手のパワーハンマーを装備していると、アービトレイターは+10%の{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}を付与され、この武器で{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}攻撃された{/g}敵の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器スキル{/g}を戦闘終了まで-10する（この効果はスタックしない）。また、この武器はクリティカルダメージが+25%増加する。

languages.text: Hat der Arbitrator einen einhändigen Schock-Schlagstock, einen einhändigen Energiestreitkolben ausgerüstet, erhält er +10 % {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Parieren{/g} und reduziert die {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfähigkeit{/g} aller mit dieser Waffe {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}getroffenen{/g} Gegner bis zum Ende des Kampfes um -10 (nicht stapelbar). Außerdem verursacht diese Waffe +25 % {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritischen Schaden{/g}.
languages.original_text: With a one-handed shock baton or a one-handed power maul equipped, the Arbitrator gains +10% to {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} and reduces the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} of enemies {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with this weapon by −10 until the end of combat (does not stack). This weapon also deals +25% more {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Hat der Arbitrator einen einhändigen Schock-Schlagstock, einen einhändigen Energiehammer oder einen einhändigen Krafthammer ausgerüstet, erhält er +10 % {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Parieren{/g} und reduziert die {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfähigkeit{/g} aller mit dieser Waffe {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}getroffenen{/g} Gegner bis zum Ende des Kampfes um -10 (nicht stapelbar). Außerdem verursacht diese Waffe +25 % kritischen Schaden.

languages.text: Когда арбитр экипирован одноручной шоковой дубиной или одноручной силовой булавой, он получает +10% к {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парированию{/g} и уменьшает {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближний Бой{/g} противников, получивших {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g} этим оружием, на −10 до конца боя (не суммируется). Также это оружие наносит на 25% больше {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критического урона{/g}.
languages.original_text: With a one-handed shock baton or a one-handed power maul equipped, the Arbitrator gains +10% to {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} and reduces the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} of enemies {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with this weapon by −10 until the end of combat (does not stack). This weapon also deals +25% more {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Когда арбитр экипирован одноручной шоковой дубиной или одноручной силовой булавой, он получает +10% к {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парированию{/g} и уменьшает {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближний Бой{/g} противников, получивших {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g} этим оружием, на −10 до конца боя (не суммируется). Также это оружие наносит на 25% больше {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критического урона{/g}.

Когда арбитр экипирован одноручной шоковой дубиной или одноручной силовой булавой, он получает +10% к {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парированию{/g} и уменьшает {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближний Бой{/g} противников, получивших {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g} этим оружием, на −10 до конца боя (не суммируется).
